title: Support & Help
subtitle: Guides for setup, security, and troubleshooting.
contactBody: Please include your workspace name, bot name or ID, a timestamp, a screenshot, and relevant api/runner logs.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.line1: Create an exchange account in Settings, then open Predictions or Manual Trading to start.
gettingStarted.line2: For first tests, use paper mode and verify API/runner health before going live.

exchangeKeys.title: Exchange API Keys
exchangeKeys.line2: Keys are protected; viewing or editing requires Re-Auth (OTP).
exchangeKeys.line3: Common issues: invalid key, IP whitelist not updated, missing trade permissions.

predictions.title: Predictions & Signals
predictions.line1: Create schedules in Predictions and choose a strategy (AI, Local, or Composite).
predictions.line2: Use confidence, tags, and signal source filters to review only actionable setups.
predictions.line3: Use 'Send to Trading Desk' to prefill tickets without automatic order execution.

strategies.title: Strategy Modes
strategies.line1: AI strategies explain and classify setups based on selected indicator payloads.
strategies.line2: Local strategies are deterministic and run inside the backend for stable results.
strategies.line3: Composite strategies chain local and AI steps; use dry-run before enabling.

manualTrading.title: Manual Trading
manualTrading.line1: Manual limit and market orders are available if enabled by your admin.
manualTrading.line2: Re-Auth (OTP) is required for manual trading actions.
manualTrading.line3: Market orders include a slippage warning and should be used carefully.

roles.title: Users, Roles & Permissions
roles.line1: Roles include Superadmin, Admin, Operator, and Viewer.
roles.line2: Permissions are configurable per workspace role.
roles.line3: Best practice: use least privilege for day-to-day operations.

security.title: Security
security.line1: Cookie-based sessions are protected with CSRF safeguards.
security.line2: Re-Auth (OTP) is required for sensitive actions.
security.line4: Audit logs help track sensitive changes and actions.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.line1: If data is missing: check API health, runner status, and websocket connectivity.
troubleshooting.line2: If prediction actions fail: review strategy config, permissions, and trace logs.
troubleshooting.line3: If orders are rejected: verify exchange permissions, symbol limits, and margin settings.
